channel.title: Rugged Manifesto on Jakob Külzer
channel.description: Recent content in Rugged Manifesto on Jakob Külzer

item.title: Reading List: JVM Internals, Rugged Software, and 12 Factor Apps
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: Recently I’ve been reading a lot about software development and philosophies on how to write better software. I really enjoyed the Rugged Manifesto as it emphasizes how software is crucial in our world and the responsibilities that come with it. Another great guide is Twelve-Factor App, a list of 12 principles on how to effectively implement and operate applications. And last but not least, Understanding JVM Internals, a really well written cross cut through the JVM, including class file format, JVM structure and stack memory layouts.
